content:
In Kherson region, Ukrainian defenders destroyed the enemy mortar calculation together with several invaders.

VideoOprylyudnilaState Border Service.

The military from the defense forces struck the enemy with the help of an FPV-aroma.

"The FPV-Drone hit: border guards have destroyed an enemy mortar calculation and several occupiers in Kherson region," the statement said.

As reported byArmyinform, in the Orikhiv and Kherson directions, Ukrainian defenders destroyed 50 units of weapons and military equipment of the enemy. Among them are 2 tanks and 13 artillery systems.

Earlier forces of defenseDestroyedIn the south, two SPA "Arrow-10" and a hostile warehouse with ammunition.
title: FPV-Dron destroyed mortar calculation along with the occupiers
description: The video was released by the State Border Guard Service.    Soldiers from the Defense Forces carried out a strike...
author: Army Inform
